p: This review includes 160 papers (summarised in Fig. 1, details in Additional file 1: appendix 4) that describe 39,577 hospitalised patients with A(H1N1)pdm09 and 33,869 treatment courses (Table 2). Twelve different treatments were used, with oseltamivir being the most common (Table 2). The median number of treatments described per manuscript is 63 (interquartile range, IQR 22–193). Of the 160 papers included, two are interventional trials ( n = 73, representing 0.2% of total reported patients), [ 6, 7] 28 are prospective observational studies ( n = 6102, accounting for 15.4% of total patients), 129 are retrospective observational studies or case reports ( n = 33,342, 84.2% of total patients) and one enrolled patients both prospectively and retrospectively ( n = 98, 0.2% of patients).
